"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54015ef963687278e8800000#post_54015ef963687278e8800000
Just got a weird thought.

Baltan is attacking the futurama earth, And He's exactly like he was in Ultraman, And Everyone else is just like they would be in a futurama episode. (Kind of like how outside of Abbot and Costello themselves, Abbot and Costello meet Frankenstein is a typical monster movie)

topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5401603c6368727cf0bc0100#post_5401603c6368727cf0bc0100
He'd have to face off against giant zoidberg and mega bender! 
I mean if this is all taking place in the same what if scenario where bender is 500 feet tall and they grew zoidberg to the same size. 

Also zoidberg and bender would probably both die horribly.
topics.author: 500b587e7f123b1f230014a9

topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5401615563687256fb2c0000#post_5401615563687256fb2c0000
Of course they would, Baltan can fire many kinds of beams from his claws, Create illusions of Clones, He can shed his skin if he suffers too much damage, (But not enough to kill him) And he can fly at a moderate speed.
